short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that automates typing on 10FastFingers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your 10FastFingers experience!
This extension automatically types for you on the 10FastFingers website, allowing you to achieve high scores effortlessly. Works on both standard tests and those with anti-cheat protection.
Features:

Simulates human typing
Adjustable speed and accuracy
Easy to use: start and stop with one click

 Use at your own risk. Remember, it's just a gaming website - have fun, but use responsibly!
